resources.string: This is the debug screen. However this text will dissapear when data arrives from the server.

--- BUG FIXES
*Force close fixes
*IAC as data fixed
*Improved telnet negotiation with optional debug mode
*Disconnect crash fixes

--- NEW FEATURES
*Portrait Mode
*Word Wrap
*Optional Break Width
*Button Sets are now renamable

Visit the website for more details!
http://bt.happygoatstudios.com

--- TEST VERSION 6 --- 
*Fixed erroneous blank commands being sent to the server on consumed .commands
*Fixed ANSI escape sequencing error that was casuing text to be consumed
*Added commas to allow commands in the .run direction stream. Example, .run 3dsw,open door,3dsn

--- TEST VERSION 5 --- 
*Hitting send on a blank input bar now correctly sends an enter to the server

--- TEST VERSION 4 --- 
*Made alias update echos optional

--- TEST VERSION 3 --- 
*.run command
*Semicolons can now be escaped with ~
*Alias replacement via .alias is now handled in recieved order

--- TEST VERSION 2 --- 
*Fixed Landscape launcher crash
*Attempted fix for ANR on window open/close
*Added .kb clear and close options

--- TEST VERSION 1 --- 
*Aliases recursion works past 2x
*Buffer loss fixed
*Crashes on window exit/enter
*No primary button label crash fixed
*Custom fonts work again
*Side by Side Installation Prep
